tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  TOUGH GRADER  CARING
comments: Nicest prof ever. Knows every student by name by the second week. Midterms and exams are really hard, and if you zone out for a second in class you can get lost, but he\'s very approachable and is always willing to help. Do the work and you\'ll do alright in his class

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Although I have no interest in physics Marzlin was always willing to help either in his office hours or at tutorials. Tutorials were SO SO helpful he would guide any answer in Mastering Physics. Doesn\'t mind staying a bit late to help. If you put in the work he\'ll notice and take it into consideration. Exams were hard.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Marzlin is a really nice guy, but he just has problems making himseld clear. Tends to solve problems for himself rather then showing the class how to solve it.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Marzlin himself admits that he isn\'t the greatest at explaining things, but he does his best. His tests are tough, especially the multiple choice, but you can do well if you try. Don\'t talk in his class. Great guy overall, and not a bad guitar player either.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very helpful professor. He will go the extra mile to help a student, as long as the student is willing to accept help from him. Great personality, and great at motivating people. He\'s a gem.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Course is hard. I almost dropped out, but he encouraged me enough throughout the year that I decided to tough it out. Can be hard to hear and understand at times, but he is great 1 on 1. The tutorials are NOT time off. Go to them, he is good at helping with problems and walking you through step by step. Despite struggling with course, great prof.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Great Prof, terrific at lectures and helpful at tutorials. I would take this course again just to have him as a prof.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The key to taking Marzlin\'s course is going for extra help, he is brilliant but has trouble conveying the info in class. But still go to class as this will affect his willingness to help you. He is a nice prof, and makes an effort to learn all the students names. Do the practice problems, as the tests are only solving (sometimes weird) questions.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Marzlin is a very friendly, enthusiastic professor, an absolute genius, but he\'s not great at teaching. He is easily angered by people talking in class but otherwise he is cheery and nice. One-on-one he is amazing and can make you understand anything, just not in the classroom. If there is 30 seconds left in class, he will use them.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr MArzlin is a great prof, we were lucky to get him to join the St FX Physics faculty this year. He is super smart and very helpful. He wants students to learn and do well so he does what he can to make this possible. Easy marker on assignments, exams were hard but open book.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Marzlin has high expectations of physics majors, but they aren\'t unreasonable. He is sometimes a little hard to understand, but he is very enthusiastic and knowledgeable. Obviously if you have made it to third year physics at stfx you know to show up to class, so do that
